author: cmlenz
msg: Store the byte array as field, and not the ByteArrayInputStream
Fixes bug that no new entries were found after the first ZIP entry, because the input stream was getting reset

author: cmlenz
msg: Add the JBoss-specific config files to the cactified WAR before running the tests

author: cmlenz
msg: The JBoss container impl no longer repackages the user-supplied WAR file, adding the JBoss specific files
This is now the responsibility of the user
